name: Dungeon Dasher (leonardo fiorini)
description:
i'm at it again! Your favourite 12-y.o. (maybe) made a new dumb game! Still trying to top the reverse broke, big fail again.

Awesome assets made by... not me https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

Controls:

GAMEPAD ONLY. I tried to make it keyboard friendly, but that's a mess.

L stick=move

One of the four buttons: dash attack.

Rules:

You have three attack charges (blue bar on the right) the catch is that your dash is useless before you hit the wall. Then you pinball around and kill all ghosty bois in your path. If you touch a fully-loaded ghosty boi while not in "pinball mode" you die. If five ghosty bois are on-screen... you die. The amount of ghosty bois is displayed on a progress bar. Glitches?

ha

haha

hahahhahahahhahahhaha

HAHHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAH

Probably.
